question: The joint training exercise "Mitra Shakti 2017" has started between India and which country?
explanation: The 5th India-Sri Lanka joint training exercise \"Mitra Shakti 2017\" has started at Aundh Military Station in Pune, Maharshtra. The exercise is based on Counter Terrorist Operations (CTO) and an Infantry company from both the countries is participating in the same. It will be conducted for next 14 days upto 26 Oct 17 & will involve sharing and learning from each others experiences.
